entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
